parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: The app context for the resource.

parameter.name: enableChangePermission
parameter.description: Indicates if the active user can change permissions for this object. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: enableAppShare
parameter.description: Indicates if the active user can change sharing to app level. Defaults to true

parameter.name: enableGlobalShare
parameter.description: Indicates if the active user can change sharing to system level. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: enableUserShare
parameter.description: Indicates if the active user can change sharing to user level. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: enableEditPermission
parameter.description: Indicates if the active user can edit this object. Defaults to true

parameter.name: ownerName
parameter.description: User name of resource owner. Defaults to the resource creator. Required for updating any knowledge object ACL properties.

parameter.name: readPermissionProperties
parameter.description: Properties that indicate resource read permissions.

parameter.name: writePermissionProperties
parameter.description: Properties that indicate write permissions of the resource.

parameter.name: isRemovable
parameter.description: Indicates whether an admin or user with sufficient permissions can delete the entity.

parameter.name: resourceShareOption
parameter.description: Indicates how the resource is shared. Required for updating any knowledge object ACL properties.
